Name: Mega Hasan
About the game: It's a normal day in Mega Hasan's world until, 'Oh no, where's my wallet?! In an effort to find his wallet, Mega Hasan searches far and wide through four worlds to retrieve his property. He climbs mountains, visits his homeland, battles horrors in the night, and blasts to the future fighting the baddest bosses in the land. Help Mega Hasan find his wallet and bring back his peace of mind. - 4 worlds and 32 levels of platforming action. - 7 unlockable characters Totally free game.
Meta Title: Mega Hasan: Jan 13, 2020, Tameem Hamoui and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Mega Hasan? Check out the release date (Jan 13, 2020), developer insights from Tameem Hamoui, and a complete game summary.
